languages.text: "Даже с лучшими это случается!" {n}— запальчиво говорит Арджента. Потом хмурится и на мгновение опускает голову.{/n} "Мои ошибки — мое бремя. Я найду способ их искупить".

traits.locale_text: "Даже с лучшими это случается!" {n}— запальчиво говорит Арджента. Потом хмурится и на мгновение опускает голову.{/n} "Мои ошибки — мое бремя. Я найду способ их искупить".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "It happens even to the best of us!" {n}Argenta says heatedly. Then she frowns and lowers her head for a moment.{/n} "My mistakes are my burden to bear. I'll find a way to atone for them."
languages.original_text: "Даже с лучшими это случается!" {n}— запальчиво говорит Арджента. Потом хмурится и на мгновение опускает голову.{/n} "Мои ошибки — мое бремя. Я найду способ их искупить".

traits.locale_text: "It happens even to the best of us!" {n}Argenta says heatedly. Then she frowns and lowers her head for a moment.{/n} "My mistakes are my burden to bear. I'll find a way to atone for them."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “就算是我们之中最出色的人，也难免会犯错误！”{n}阿洁塔激愤地说道，随后她皱起眉头，低下了头。{/n}“我的错误是我肩上的重担，我会想办法赎罪的。”
languages.original_text: "It happens even to the best of us!" {n}Argenta says heatedly. Then she frowns and lowers her head for a moment.{/n} "My mistakes are my burden to bear. I'll find a way to atone for them."

traits.locale_text: “就算是我们之中最出色的人，也难免会犯错误！”{n}阿洁塔激愤地说道，随后她皱起眉头，低下了头。{/n}“我的错误是我肩上的重担，我会想办法赎罪的。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "It happens even to the best of us!" {n}Argenta says heatedly. Then she frowns and lowers her head for a moment.{/n} "My mistakes are my burden to bear. I'll find a way to atone for them."

languages.text: «¡Podría pasarle a cualquiera!». {n}Argenta se acalora. Después, frunce el ceño y agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Mis errores son una carga que debo llevar. Encontraré la forma de expiarlos».
languages.original_text: "It happens even to the best of us!" {n}Argenta says heatedly. Then she frowns and lowers her head for a moment.{/n} "My mistakes are my burden to bear. I'll find a way to atone for them."

traits.locale_text: «¡Podría pasarle a cualquiera!». {n}Argenta se acalora. Después, frunce el ceño y agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Mis errores son una carga que debo llevar. Encontraré la forma de expiarlos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「それは我々にも起こり得ることだ！」{n}アルジェンタは熱く言葉を紡ぐ。そして顔をしかめてしばらく項垂れた。{/n}「私の過ちは私の重荷だ。それを償う方法を見つけなければならない」
languages.original_text: "It happens even to the best of us!" {n}Argenta says heatedly. Then she frowns and lowers her head for a moment.{/n} "My mistakes are my burden to bear. I'll find a way to atone for them."

traits.locale_text: 「それは我々にも起こり得ることだ！」{n}アルジェンタは熱く言葉を紡ぐ。そして顔をしかめてしばらく項垂れた。{/n}「私の過ちは私の重荷だ。それを償う方法を見つけなければならない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Das kommt in den besten Familien vor!"{n}, sagt Argenta hitzig. Dann runzelt sie die Stirn und senkt einen Augenblick lang den Kopf.{/n} "Meine Fehler sind eine Last, die ich selbst tragen muss. Ich werde einen Weg finden, Buße zu tun."
languages.original_text: "It happens even to the best of us!" {n}Argenta says heatedly. Then she frowns and lowers her head for a moment.{/n} "My mistakes are my burden to bear. I'll find a way to atone for them."

traits.locale_text: "Das kommt in den besten Familien vor!"{n}, sagt Argenta hitzig. Dann runzelt sie die Stirn und senkt einen Augenblick lang den Kopf.{/n} "Meine Fehler sind eine Last, die ich selbst tragen muss. Ich werde einen Weg finden, Buße zu tun."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Cela arrive même aux meilleurs d'entre nous ! » {n}répond Argenta avec véhémence. Puis elle fronce les sourcils et baisse la tête un instant.{/n} « Mes erreurs sont mon fardeau et le mien seul. Je trouverai un moyen de m'en absoudre. »
languages.original_text: "It happens even to the best of us!" {n}Argenta says heatedly. Then she frowns and lowers her head for a moment.{/n} "My mistakes are my burden to bear. I'll find a way to atone for them."

traits.locale_text: « Cela arrive même aux meilleurs d'entre nous ! » {n}répond Argenta avec véhémence. Puis elle fronce les sourcils et baisse la tête un instant.{/n} « Mes erreurs sont mon fardeau et le mien seul. Je trouverai un moyen de m'en absoudre. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Neticede ben de insanım!" {n}Argenta hararetle söyleniyor. Yüzü düşen rahibe, bir müddet başını eğiyor.{/n} "Hata benim, suç benim. Telafi etmenin bir yolunu bulacağım."
languages.original_text: "It happens even to the best of us!" {n}Argenta says heatedly. Then she frowns and lowers her head for a moment.{/n} "My mistakes are my burden to bear. I'll find a way to atone for them."

traits.locale_text: "Neticede ben de insanım!" {n}diye hararetle söyleniyor Argenta. Yüzü düşen rahibe bir müddet başını eğiyor.{/n} "Hata benim, suç benim. Telafi etmenin bir yolunu bulacağım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
